text.name: sys_description
text.text: ECWolf is basically an advanced port of Wolfenstein 3D, Spear of Destiny and Super 3D Noah's Ark based on the Wolf4SDL engine. It also uses some code from ZDoom to provide a wide range of mod editing capabilities without having to modify the source code. You can thus very simply modify the weapons and levels of the game and package your mod in a single file. For gamers, the engine offers better gameplay, supports 16:9 resolutions, unlimited saves, unlimited shape or size maps and HD texture packs.
